Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan and Ireland will face each other in the last match of Group A encounter in Florida on June 16, 2024.
Ireland and Pakistan have been knocked out from the tournament.
Ireland did manage to take the Pakistan team by surprise in their recent 3-match T20I series.
For Ireland, the Sunday encounter will be an opportunity to not return win-less as they are yet to register a win in the tournament.
Pakistan have registered only one win against Canada in the tournament so far.
Pakistan would look to their tournament on a high, if the weather permits.
This is the first time that Pakistan has been eliminated after just 3 games of the T20 World Cup.
Ireland had not played a match for a week and hence, it might be difficult to tell if the side would make any changes.
The forecast for Sunday is expected to be better, but it all will come down to how much rain falls overnight and how the outfield will be in the morning.
Ireland's coach Heinrich Malan emphasized the importance of preparation and executing their plans.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Central Broward Regional Park Stadium Turf Ground, Lauderhill in Florida.
Pakistan and Ireland have met each other on 4 occasions in T20Is.
The only time these 2 teams faced each other in a T20 World Cup game was in 2009, when Pakistan won by 39 runs.
Pakistan might look to bring in some changes in their playing XI and give opportunities to the players who have not got a chance so far.
